Improvements.Description: There is no need to create a new `allMap` HashMap that is a copy of `copyMap`. You can simply iterate over `copyMap` itself, reducing memory usage and improving performance.

Improvements.Improvement: Remove unnecessary null check for order
Improvements.Description: In the final loop, you're checking if the order is null and if it is, you're setting it to the index. But the order can never be null because it's always being set in the map computations. This check is unnecessary and can be removed.
